title: AOL still sux
body: I saw this <a href="http://www.reuters.com/newsArticle.jhtml?type=topNews&storyID=4648876">reuters article on how AOL sees a future in web standards</a>.  At first I thought it might be cool...  then I realized that it's AOL, and all they've done in the past with anything that they've come in contact with is virtually halt any technological progress whatsoever.  You never know, maybe they'll open up AIM as a web service.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-29

AOL still sux

I saw this

bodyNavItems.text: Where does Adult Swim get its ironic and self-referential humor from?
